blogPost.title: How can you learn faster? Answer by @Tim_Denning, viral blogger. https://t.co/ugQ8nTBAZA https://t.co/Glsr7eQVGV
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: どうすればより早く学習できるのでしょうか？Answer by @Tim_Denning, viral blogger. https://t.co/ugQ8nTBAZA https://t.co/Glsr7eQVGV
如何才能学得更快？回答者：@Tim_Denning，病毒学博主。https://t.co/ugQ8nTBAZA https://t.co/Glsr7eQVGV
如何才能學得更快？回答者：@Tim_Denning，病毒學博主。https://t.co/ugQ8nTBAZA https://t.co/Glsr7eQVGV

previous.title: What are the top three triggers for anxiety in the workplace and how can they be avoided? Answer by @aprilrinne, author of Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change. https://t.co/el0qhshrCs https://t.co/8wiexa481h

localize.full_text: 職場で不安を感じるきっかけのトップ3と、それを回避する方法を教えてください。Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change』の著者、@aprilrinneの回答です。 https://t.co/el0qhshrCs https://t.co/8wiexa481h
在工作场所引发焦虑的三大因素是什么，如何避免这些因素？回答者：@aprilrinne, Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change. https://t.co/el0qhshrCs https://t.co/8wiexa481h
在工作場所引發焦慮的三大因素是什麼，如何避免這些因素？回答者：@aprilrinne, Flux: 8 Superpowers for Thriving in Constant Change. https://t.co/el0qhshrCs https://t.co/8wiexa481h

next.title: What are some simple tips that can make people more effective at public speaking? Answer by @JasonPatel13, Founder of Transizion. https://t.co/GrZwt0pHGJ https://t.co/k0uWiDeWMt

localize.full_text: 人前で話すのが苦手な人のための簡単なコツは何ですか？Answer by @JasonPatel13, Founder of Transizion. https://t.co/GrZwt0pHGJ https://t.co/k0uWiDeWMt
有哪些简单的技巧可以使人们在公开演讲时更加有效？答案：@JasonPatel13，Transizion的创始人。https://t.co/GrZwt0pHGJ https://t.co/k0uWiDeWMt
有哪些簡單的技巧可以使人們在公開演講時更加有效？答案：@JasonPatel13，Transizion的創始人。https://t.co/GrZwt0pHGJ https://t.co/k0uWiDeWMt
